title: Roger Williams National Memorial: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility          The National Memorial Visitor Center has access ramp to get wheeled chairs in from the street (put in place on a case by case situation). The restrooms in the Visitor Center are accessible. The memorial grounds has brick walkways that are accessible.  Fire alarms have both audio and visual signaling. There is an induction loop to assist those with hearing aids. The video is closed captioned.
